Verses.Text:
<fArial Black>I have lived a life of sin in this world I'm living in
I have done forbidden things I shouldn't do</f>

<fArial Black>I asked a beggar along the way, if he could tell me where to stay
Where I could find real happiness and love that's true</f>

<fArial Black>Across the bridge, there's no more sorrow
Across the bridge, there's no more pain
The Sun will shine across the river
And you'll never be unhappy again</f>

<fArial Black>Follow the footsteps of the King till you hear the voices ring
They'll be singing out the glory of the land</f>

<fArial Black>The river Jordan will be near, the sound of trumpets you will hear
And you'll behold the most precious place ever known to man</f>

Songs.Reference: 101"Ani gwe nnina mu ggulu wabula ggwe

Verses.Text:
YESU ng'addayo gye yava,
Mu buwanguzi obungi,
Mumulabe ye Kabaka
Afuga bakabaka,

Bamalayika be bonna,
Bakuba nnyo ennanga,
Eggye lyonna er'yomu ggulu,
Baaniriza Katonda.

Ani ajja kitiibwa,
N'obuwanguzi obungi,
Oyo ow'amaanyi mu ntalo,
Awangudde omulabe,

Bwe yafa ku musaalaba,
Era n'ava mu ntaana,
N'aweebwa erinnya erisinga,
Bonna bamusinzenga.

Atuzuukizza naffe,
Tufuge wamu naye,
Eyo mu kitiibwa ekingi,
Ne bamalayika be,

Omulokozi afuga,
Katonda era omuntu,
Erinnya lye wa kitalo,
Katonda ataggwaawo.

Ekitiibwa eri Kitaffe,
N'eri Omwana we Yesu,
N'eri Omwoyo Omutukuvu,
Omu mu Busatu,

Ekitiibwa kibe gy'ali,
Ensi zimuyimbire,
Ettendo libe mu ggulu,
N'emirembe ku nsi.

Verses.Text:
I am so glad that our Father in heaven
Tells of His love in the Book He has given:
Wonderful things in the Bible I see;
This is the dearest, that Jesus loves me.

I am so glad that Jesus loves me,
Jesus loves me, Jesus loves me,
I am so glad that Jesus loves me,
Jesus loves even me.

Oh, if there’s only one song I can sing,
When in His beauty I see the great King,
This shall my song in eternity be,
“Oh, what a wonder that Jesus loves me!”

Jesus loves me, and I know I love Him:
Love brought Him down my poor soul to redeem ;
Yes, it was love made Him die on the tree:
Oh, I am certain that Jesus loves me !

If one should ask of me, how can I tell?
Glory to Jesus, I know very well !
God’s Holy Spirit with mine doth agree,
Constantly witnessing Jesus loves me.

In this assurance I find sweetest rest,
Trusting in Jesus, I know I am blest ;

Satan, dismayed, from my soul now doth flee,
When I just tell him that Jesus loves me
